GETSLOTMIGRATIONS.summary: Get the status of ongoing and recently finished slot import and export operations.
GETSLOTMIGRATIONS.complexity: O(N), where N is the number of active slot import and export jobs.

reply_schema.description: A nested list of maps, one for each migration, with keys and values representing migration fields.

link_name.description: A 40-byte randomly generated hex string representing the migration.

slot_ranges.description: Slot ranges in the format <start>-<end> inclusive, each range separated by a space.

target_node.description: The target node name in the migration job.

source_node.description: The source node name in the migration job.

create_time.description: Creation time, in seconds since the unix epoch.

last_update_time.description: Last update time, in seconds since the unix epoch.

last_ack_time.description: Last received ack time, in seconds since the unix epoch.

state.description: Human readable string representing the migration job state.

message.description: Human readable status message with more details.

cow_size.description: Copy on write bytes during slot migration fork.
